extensionDescription.message: Set up a browser to use the i2p http proxy automatically

resetMessage.description: Message for the Reset Tunnel button

infoMessage.message: You are now free to browse the eepWeb! Your browser is now configured to browse anonymously on the I2P network. As you browse, your traffic will be routed through other network nodes to disguise it's origin, both from the server and from the nodes themselves.

newsMessage.message: Visit the I2P Blog to learn the latest about i2p.

forumMessage.message: Visit the I2P Forum to learn more or ask for assistance

hostText.description: Host for the HTTP or SOCKS5 Proxy

portText.description: Port for the HTTP or SOCKS5 Proxy

controlHelpText.message: These options will be inert if used with the default i2p HTTP or SOCKS proxy.
controlHelpText.description: Help for configuring the options for the Reset Tunnel button

controlHostText.description: Host for the Reset Tunnel button

controlPortText.description: Port for the Reset Tunnel button
